text: Excellent diner experience. Always friendly with wonderful food. The homemade raisin bread with breakfast make my day.   The soups for lunch are always great. My favourites being the Ruben and the Cajun potato.  And don't forget about pies
I've been here 3 times now and it's so good. They have delicious home fries, generous portions, and hearty homemade soups and pies. The interior is a trip back in time, I just love it.
Good little restaurant.  Stopped by on our way back from the park.   Service and Food was good.
